name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bye bye YouTube Yoodles: Hide useless banners

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks these annoying undismissable yoodles and useless banners that keep coming back no matter how many times you dismiss them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks these annoying undismissable yoodles and commemorative banners that keep coming back no matter how many times you dismiss them.
